title: [Large-Scale] Construction Industry Entrepreneurship Simulation Experiential Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Construction Terminology and Industrial Structures, and Ability to Perform Simple Financial Calculations
context.additional_context: Experiential Learning Environment Utilizing Smartphone-Based Simulation Tools

learning_goals: Recreate the five-stage construction startup process (preliminary survey - business plan - funding - construction management - marketing) through simulation
Identify three financial risks (funding, material price fluctuations, workforce management) that may occur in construction startups and establish response strategies
Analyze three startup failure factors through decision-making simulations based on actual construction site cases

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
